entity.name: Project

many-to-one.name: projectTimeUnit
many-to-one.title: Project time unit
many-to-one.help: This will determine the unit used for project-wide reporting. If there are tasks using another unit, conversions will be made using 'Number of hours in a day' value.

integer.name: taskStatusManagementSelect
integer.title: Task status management
integer.help: The status of project tasks will be defined by the selection chosen. The priority of the statuses displayed is determined first by the category, then by the project. Once a task is linked to the project, the selection can no longer be modified.

boolean.name: isShowProgress
boolean.title: Task progress
boolean.help: Activate a field on a project task where you can record the task progress in %.

boolean.name: isShowPlanning
boolean.title: Task planning
boolean.help: Activates a Planification tab on the project-task-form allowing to record planned times on tasks, in order to compare with actual spent time.

boolean.name: isShowFrequency
boolean.title: Task recurrence
boolean.help: Activate a panel tab, within a project-task-form related to the project, allowing to replicate a task following a date frequency defined by the user.

boolean.name: manageTimeSpent
boolean.title: Time Spent?
boolean.help: Allow to allocate Time spent from the project-task-form. A readonly logtimes paneltab will also appear on the related project-form. Note: if you use the HR timesheets, these log times will allocate HR Timesheet for the concerned colleague.

boolean.name: isShowSection
boolean.title: Section?
boolean.help: Allow to activate an additional tasks classification, customizable according the the user needs. Section can be created in the Configuration sub-menu of the Project menu.

boolean.name: isShowTopic
boolean.title: Topic?
boolean.help: Allow to open discussion topic, where project members can interact, accessible via the the Tools menu.

boolean.name: isShowGantt
boolean.title: Enable Gantt view
boolean.help: Activates a gantt view of the project accessible via the Tools menu.

boolean.name: isShowKanbanPerStatus
boolean.title: Enable Kanban view per status
boolean.help: Activates a Kanban view with tasks of the project categorized by status, accessible via the Tools menu.

boolean.name: isShowKanbanPerSection
boolean.title: Enable Kanban view per section
boolean.help: Activates a Kanban view with tasks of the project categorized by section, accessible via the Tools menu.

boolean.name: isShowCalendarPerStatus
boolean.title: Enable calendar view per status
boolean.help: Activates a calendar view with tasks of the project categorized by status, accessible via the Tools menu.

boolean.name: isShowCalendarPerSection
boolean.title: Enable calendar view per section
boolean.help: Activates a calendar view with tasks of the project categorized by section, accessible via the Tools menu.

boolean.name: isShowCalendarPerUser
boolean.title: Enable calendar view per user
boolean.help: Activates a calendar view with tasks of the project categorized by user, accessible via the Tools menu.

many-to-one.name: completedTaskStatus
many-to-one.title: Completed task status
many-to-one.help: This task status will be used to define which status is flagged as completed for tasks.

boolean.name: enableStatusProgressByCategory
boolean.title: Enable status progress by category.
boolean.help: This option is used to activate the automatic allocation of progress to project tasks via project task category. If this option is enabled, the progress field will be available in the category view and the category will be updated using this data (or the data entered in the status if this is empty).
